GMCM.ToggleHotkey.Desc: This is the toggle hotkey for Auto-Combat.
GMCM.AutoSwitch.Desc: Automatically select the leftmost melee weapon on the toolbar.
GMCM.ContinuousAutoAttack.Desc: Continuously attack nearby enemies when a melee weapon is equipped.
GMCM.EffectOnBarrels.Desc: Include barrels as a target for the melee weapon.
GMCM.IgnoreOnFarm.Desc: Auto-Combat will not action while on the farm.
GMCM.IgnoreInSlimeHutch.Desc: Auto-Combat will not action while in the Slime Hutch.
GMCM.AutoTargeting.Desc: Requires 'Continuous Auto Attack' to be enabled to take effect. The farmer will automatically track enemies within range.
GMCM.AutoTargeting.Range.Desc: The search range for auto-targeting, measured in map tiles.
GMCM.SpecialMove.Dagger.Desc: Automatically uses the Dagger's special move.
GMCM.SpecialMove.Club.Desc: Automatically uses the Club's area special move.
GMCM.SpecialMove.Club.NumOfEnemies.Desc: Number of enemies needed to trigger the Club special move.
GMCM.SpecialMove.Defense.Desc: Automatically uses the Sword's parry special.
GMCM.Slingshot.Fire.HotKey.Desc: If the Slingshot is in the toolbar, it will fire and quickly switch back to the previous tool after firing.
GMCM.Slingshot.AutoAim.Desc:
Mouse Control: magnetically targets the unit closest to the cursor.
Controller: magnetically targets the unit closest to the farmer.
GMCM.Slingshot.NoConsumption.Desc: Ammunition is not consumed for shots fired through this mod.
Slingshot.NoTool: Cannot shoot, the Slingshot is not in the toolbar.
Slingshot.NoBullet: Cannot shoot, no ammunition in the Slingshot.
GMCM.FollowUpShots.Desc: Marks an enemy as a target for follow-up shots after a melee attack, determining the number of follow-up shots triggered.
GMCM.FollowUpShots.MinimumDistance.Desc: When enemies move beyond this range, follow-up shots are triggered, measured in map tiles.
